recommended_degree: Pendidikan  Bahasa Inggris, Pendidikan Bahasa Dan Sastra Inggris, Manajemen Ekonomi, Komputerisasi Akuntansi, Administrasi Bisnis Internasional (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in preparing, organizing, and maintaining procurement documents (PR, PO, quotations, contracts).
- Request and collect price quotations from suppliers and prepare basic price comparisons.
- Coordinate with internal departments to confirm specifications and procurement needs.
- Follow up with suppliers on orders, delivery schedules, and required documents.
- Monitor the status of purchases from request to delivery and report any delays or issues.
- Support vendor performance tracking and maintain updated vendor information.
- Ensure all procurement activities follow company policies, procedures, and confidentiality standards.
